comments.text: taskclusteretl pulls the all the worker resource tagged billing data but it is only a small fraction of what the Platform Costs dashboards reports.  Either there is a lot of stuff not tagged or they are aggregating different projects this task is to sort it out.
comments.raw_text: taskclusteretl pulls the all the worker resource tagged billing data but it is only a small fraction of what the Platform Costs dashboards reports.  Either there is a lot of stuff not tagged or they are aggregating different projects this task is to sort it out.

comments.text: Most of the GCP difference is the community TC (the current dashboard only shows the Firefox costs).
